abstract: New York Mets manager Terry Collins discusses coming season in first official news conference of year; expectations are high for National League defending champions as team has added even more depth to its roster.
lead_paragraph: With the Mets coming off a World Series appearance, Manager Terry Collins is facing a different kind of pressure this season, if less so than the previous year.

headline.main: Terry Collins Welcomes Greater Expectations for the Mets
headline.print_headline: Collins Welcomes Greater Expectations for the N.L.’s Defending Champions

snippet: With the Mets coming off a World Series appearance, Manager Terry Collins is facing a different kind of pressure this season, if less so than the previous year.
